strokes.description: Sharp angular lines creating a broken path, echoing the existing geometric fragments
Intersecting diagonal lines adding to the sense of disconnection
Zigzag pattern extending the fractured composition

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing image shows sharp, disconnected lines and angles that suggest a fragmented, broken quality. I chose to enhance this mood by adding more angular intersections and sharp geometric shapes that don't quite connect, using quick and varied stroke speeds to emphasize the sense of disruption and discontinuity. The pen brush provides clean, precise lines that maintain the stark, fractured aesthetic.
